full_summary:
===============

### Bid Title and Notice Number
B3 Survey Compass Repair and Overhaul
PW-22-01017798

### Tender Notice

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice PW-22-01017798 regarding the B3 Magnetic Survey Compass Repair and Overhaul service. The notice details the procurement of an R&O Contract for the B3 Compass, as outlined in the Technical Statement of Work (SOW) annexed.

### Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: W8485-237376
* Tender Closing Date: January 26, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: December 20, 2022

### Procurement Information
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2 Canada

### Contact Information
Davis-Kelly, Mac
Email: mac.davis-kelly2@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (819) 939-6101

### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website:
- [Link to English Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/19/d4b734432fab5caae111b909b85ef4e6/w8485-_237376_rfp_b3_compass_repairs_-en.pdf)
- [Link to French Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/3a952592db8bc08d1d4fab5c6b99e153/w8485-_237376_rfp_b3_compass_repairs_-fr_amdt_001.pdf)

### Requirements
The DND is seeking a supplier to provide the R&O services for the B3 Magnetic Survey Compass. Suppliers must satisfy the conditions outlined in the Technical Statement of Work (SOW). Further details can be found in Annex A of the tender documents. The DND reserves the right to amend the terms and conditions prior to the tender closing date.
